titleStmt.title: The history of Great Britain being the life and reign of King James the First, relating to what passed from his first access to the crown, till his death / by Arthur Wilson.
titleStmt.author: Wilson, Arthur, 1595-1652.

biblFull.extent: [12], 292 [i.e. 298], [8] p., [89] leaves of plates (some folded) : ill., maps, ports.

notesStmt.note: This copy has been interleaved with plates, of varying dates of engraving, sometime after its original manufacture.
Reproductions of original in the Huntington Library (reel 1110:15) and Corpus Christi College (University of Oxford). Library (reel 2987:21)..
